snippet: The name Mrs. Maxwell’s was inspired by Maxwell House coffee and a high school. The owners of the bakery added “Mrs.” to the name to appear as if “a little old lady” were making the cakes.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Mrs Maxwell's Bakery, East New York business that has drawn generations of families seeking birthday, quinceanera and wedding cakes.
lead_paragraph: The name Mrs. Maxwell’s was inspired by Maxwell House coffee and a high school. The owners of the bakery added “Mrs.” to the name to appear as if “a little old lady” were making the cakes.

headline.print_headline: Stolen Recipe? No Little Old Lady?
headline.main: A Brooklyn Bakery Named for No One
